description: Lists the resolvers for a given API and type.

nested_items.name: resolvers
nested_items.description: The Resolver objects.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The resolver type name.

nested_items.name: fieldName
nested_items.description: The resolver field name.

nested_items.name: dataSourceName
nested_items.description: The resolver data source name.

nested_items.name: resolverArn
nested_items.description: The resolver Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: requestMappingTemplate
nested_items.description: The request mapping template.

nested_items.name: responseMappingTemplate
nested_items.description: The response mapping template.

nested_items.name: kind
nested_items.description: The resolver type.

nested_items.name: pipelineConfig
nested_items.description: The PipelineConfig.

nested_items.name: functions
nested_items.description: A list of Function objects.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: syncConfig
nested_items.description: The SyncConfig for a resolver attached to a versioned data source.

nested_items.name: conflictHandler
nested_items.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

nested_items.name: conflictDetection
nested_items.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerConfig
nested_items.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: cachingConfig
nested_items.description: The caching configuration for the resolver.

nested_items.name: ttl
nested_items.description: The TTL in seconds for a resolver that has caching activated.

nested_items.name: cachingKeys
nested_items.description: The caching keys for a resolver that has caching activated.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: maxBatchSize
nested_items.description: The maximum batching size for a resolver.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

nested_items.name: runtimeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.

nested_items.name: metricsConfig
nested_items.description: Enables or disables enhanced resolver metrics for specified resolvers. Note that metricsConfig won't be used unless the resolverLevelMetricsBehavior value is set to PER_RESOLVER_METRICS. If the resolverLevelMetricsBehavior is set to FULL_REQUEST_RESOLVER_METRICS instead, metricsConfig will be ignored. However, you can still set its value.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier to pass in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
